title: Is there a way we could more easily distinguish the TFT boards to prevent so many board mistakes?
body:
Title.  There are way too many mistakes in both original posts and replies.  There's got to be a better way to organize this to help prevent these mistakes.  

Perhaps add a second box at the bottom of the boards list, so there's some physical separation between it and the rest of league?

replies.body: I had to find this board via google.  Couldn't find it in board discussion.
Honestly one easy solution is new banner and probably bracket off the sidebar like they do with the rules and dev corner.  Make it clear they're seperate games.
